## 读书，不是非做不可的事，而是想要去做的事。

# 书单

```{r setup, include=F}
library(tidyverse)
library(formattable)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')
```

```{r book_list, echo=F, message=F, warning=F}
output_col_names <- c(
    '书名',
    '作者',
    '买了',
    '读了',
    '读完了',
    '打个分'
)

book_list <- read_tsv(
    '../data/books/book-list.tsv',
    col_types = 'cccccDDDi')

book_list %>%
    mutate(
        book = ifelse(is.na(blog_link),
                      book,
                      text_spec(book, link = blog_link)),
        stars = paste0(str_dup('&#11089;', stars),
                       str_dup('&#11090;', 5-stars))
    ) %>%
    select(c('book', 'author', 'purchasing_date', 
             'reading_start_date', 'reading_finish_date', 'stars')) %>%
    setNames(output_col_names) %>%
    kable("html", escape = F) %>%
    row_spec(0, align = 'right') %>%
    column_spec(2, width = '4em') %>%
    column_spec(3, width = '5.8em') %>%
    column_spec(4, width = '5.8em') %>%
    column_spec(5, width = '5.8em') %>%
    column_spec(6, width = '4em')
```
